sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_WF_PROJECT ( SETUP_NAME , SETUP_CODE , SETUP_REQFILE_CODE , SETUP_REQER_NAME , SETUP_REQER_PHONE , SETUP_REQ_DATE , PRJ_NAME , PRJ_CODE , PRJ_CATEGORY , PRJ_TYPE , PRJ_STATUS , COST , LENGTH , DOMAIN_NAME , PRJ_DESC , FTP_NAME , PARENT_PRJ_CODE , CUID , CREATE_TIME , LAST_MODIFY_TIME ) values ( #setupName# , #setupCode# , #setupReqFileCode# , #setupReqerName# , #setupReqerPhone# , #setupReqDate# , #prjName# , #prjCode# , #prjCategory# , #prjType# , #prjStatus# , #cost# , #length# , #domainName# , #prjDesc# , #ftpName# , #parentPrjCode# , #cuid# , sysdate , sysdate)
sqlMap.update: update T_WF_PROJECT p set prj_status = #prjStatus# , username = #userName# , LAST_MODIFY_TIME = sysdate where p.cuid = #cuid#
sqlMap.select: select SETUP_NAME , SETUP_CODE , SETUP_REQFILE_CODE , SETUP_REQER_NAME , SETUP_REQER_PHONE , SETUP_REQ_DATE , PRJ_NAME , PRJ_CODE , PRJ_CATEGORY , PRJ_TYPE , COST , LENGTH , DOMAIN_NAME , PRJ_DESC , nvl(FTP_NAME, (select FTP_NAME from T_WF_PROJECT tt where t.PARENT_PRJ_CODE = tt.PRJ_CODE)) FTP_NAME , PARENT_PRJ_CODE , CUID , CREATE_TIME , USERNAME , PRJ_STATUS , LAST_MODIFY_TIME from T_WF_PROJECT t where CUID = #cuid#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_his_an_pos select * from an_pos t where t.related_project_cuid = #prjcode#
insert into t_his_an_onu select * from an_onu t where t.related_project_cuid = #prjcode#
insert into t_his_t_rofh_full_address select * from t_rofh_full_address t where t.related_project_cuid = #prjcode#
insert into t_his_gpon_cover select * from gpon_cover t where t.related_project_cuid = #prjcode#
insert into t_his_BUSINESS_COMMUNITY select * from BUSINESS_COMMUNITY t where t.related_project_cuid = #prjcode#

insert into T_WF_FTTX_GC select seq_WF_FTTX_GC.Nextval, REGIONCODE , DEVICENAME , OLTFACTORY , DNSUBNECODE , DNPACKAGECODE , OLTSLOT , PORTNO , VILLAGE_NAME , VILLAGE_ID , PRJCODE , prjname , PARENTPRJCODE , OLTTELENETIPADDR , OLTIDINEMS , UPBASIP , UPBASSLOT , UPBASPACKAGE , UPBASPORT , OLTSVLAN , OLTCVLAN , SPLITRATIO , SPLITLEVEL , PARENT_NAME , ptp.label_cn PARENT_OBDCODE , PASSWORD , DEVICE_TYPE , OPERATIONTYPE , OPERATIONTIME , RESULT , OPT_POWER , FAILDESC , CALL_RESULT , ponportname , '' from v_fttx_gc vg ,ptp ptp where ptp.related_ne_cuid = vg.pos_cuid and ptp.port_sub_type = 13 and vg.cuid = #cuid# and not exists(select 1 from T_WF_FTTX_GC gc where gc.parent_name = vg.PARENT_NAME)
sqlMap.delete: delete from T_WF_FTTX_GC where PRJCODE = #PRJ_CODE# and PARENTPRJCODE = #PARENT_PRJ_CODE#
sqlMap.update: update T_WF_FTTX_GC gc set password = #password#, jh_result = #reason# where ponportname = #ponPort# and exists( select 1 from t_wf_project wp where wp.cuid = #cuid# and wp.prj_code = gc.prjcode and wp.parent_prj_code = gc.parentprjcode )
update T_WF_FTTX_GC gc set result = 0 where exists( select 1 from t_wf_project wp where wp.cuid = #CUID# and wp.prj_code = gc.prjcode and wp.parent_prj_code = gc.parentprjcode )
sqlMap.select:
select cuid,prj_status from t_wf_project where PRJ_CODE = #prjCode#
AND PARENT_PRJ_CODE IS NULL
AND PARENT_PRJ_CODE = #parentPrjCode#
sqlMap.update: update t_wf_project set SETUP_NAME = #setupName# , SETUP_CODE = #setupCode# , SETUP_REQFILE_CODE = #setupReqFileCode# , SETUP_REQER_NAME = #setupReqerName# , SETUP_REQER_PHONE = #setupReqerPhone# , SETUP_REQ_DATE = #setupReqDate# , PRJ_NAME = #prjName# , PRJ_CODE = #prjCode# , PRJ_CATEGORY = #prjCategory# , PRJ_TYPE = #prjType# , COST = #cost# , LENGTH = #length# , DOMAIN_NAME = #domainName# , PRJ_DESC = #prjDesc# , FTP_NAME = #ftpName# , PARENT_PRJ_CODE = #parentPrjCode# , LAST_MODIFY_TIME = sysdate where cuid = #cuid#
sqlMap.select: select cuid from t_wf_project where cuid = #cuid# and prjStatus= #prjStatus#

select distinct wp.cuid, olt.label_dev, olt.label_cn as DEVICENAME, substr(olt.fdn, 5, instr(olt.fdn, ':', 1) - 5) as OLTEMS, p.label_cn as PONPORTNAME, (select gc.password from t_wf_fttx_gc gc where gc.password is not null and gc.ponportname = p.label_cn and gc.device_type =1 and rownum = 1 ) PASSWORD, p.svlan OLTSVLAN, '200' OLTCVLAN, (select label_cn from device_vendor where device_vendor.cuid = olt.related_vendor_cuid) OLTFACTORY from trans_element olt, ptp p, an_pos pos, t_wf_project wp where olt.cuid = pos.related_olt_cuid and p.cuid = pos.related_port_cuid and pos.related_project_cuid = wp.cuid and wp.cuid =#CUID#
#POSNAMES[]#
select wp.cuid from t_wf_project wp where wp.PRJ_CODE =#code# and PARENT_PRJ_CODE = #pcode#
select distinct gc.parent_name from t_wf_fttx_gc gc,t_wf_project wp where gc.result = -9 and gc.prjcode = wp.prj_code and gc.parentprjcode = wp.parent_prj_code and wp.cuid=#cuid#
sqlMap.update: update an_pos ap set live_cycle = 1 ,setup_time = sysdate where ap.related_project_cuid = #cuid#
update t_rofh_full_address fa set COMMUNITY_TYPE = 2 where fa.related_project_cuid = #cuid#
update ptp set ptp.port_state = 1 where exists (select 1 from an_pos ap where ap.related_project_cuid = #cuid# and ap.related_upne_port_cuid = ptp.cuid)
sqlMap.select: select cuid from t_rofh_full_address fa where fa.related_project_cuid = #cuid#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from t_rofh_addr_rel where id in (SELECT id FROM t_rofh_addr_rel t
START WITH rel_full_addr_cuid = #CUID# CONNECT BY PRIOR rel_id = ID and (select count(1) from t_rofh_addr_rel r where r.rel_id = t.id) < 2)

delete from t_wf_fttx_gc gc where gc.parent_name in
#names[]#
sqlMap.select: select label_cn from an_pos ap where ap.related_project_cuid = #cuid# and not exists( select 1 from an_pos t where t.related_upne_cuid = ap.cuid ) and not exists (select 1 from t_wf_fttx_gc gc, t_wf_project wp where gc.parent_name = ap.label_cn and wp.cuid = #cuid# and wp.prj_code = gc.prjcode and wp.parent_prj_code = gc.parentprjcode)
